name: Deathlands
description:
Deathlands is a multiplayer turn-based survival game where you fight other players to remain the last man standing. If you only play one turn-based game, make it this one, because you'll love it!Features
  • Easy to learn tutorial!
  • Singleplayer!
  • Multiplayer!
  • Lot's of pixels!
  • Low system requirements, perfect for your laptop, you could even run it on a potato!
  • You can play with people from other continents without worrying about lag because it's turn-based!
  • A few minor bugs but don't worry, 50% of the time, it works everytime!
